error_message: Variable reference is not valid. ':' was not followed by a valid variable name character
root_cause: PowerShell parser interprets $category: as an invalid variable reference
solution_applied: Changed to $output += "${category}:" using proper variable delimiting
fix_type: Variable reference delimiting with curly braces
response_end: [RECOMMENDATION: TEST] - Run Test-SynchronizedHashtableFramework.ps1 to validate the syntax fix and test the synchronized hashtable framework implementation
